Text: eztv - you are the man (or woman?)!! I was hoping this would be here this morning and you pulled through - Thanks!
I dont know what this is, but anything new Firefly has got to be worth a look! Now lets all sing the ballad of Jayne
thanks all - however this is NOT a new episode, more like a reunion with the actors/crew - what did you think - how did you feel etc bah ~
yeah this is a table discussion before and during comic con, but damn, joss frikkin cries. So does nathan. Pretty hard core.
super cool if your a fan   thx i'm a FAN a BIG FAN

This is an interview with the cast and crew from Firefly!
 All of your favorite Serenity crew members, Nathan Fillion, Sean Maher, Summer Glau, Adam Baldwin, Morena Baccarin, Alan Tudyk, Gina Torres, Jewel Staite, AND creator Joss Whedon will be reuniting for a behind-the-scenes look of the popular series, as well as footage from their panel at this year's Comic-Con!
